-- int_å±¤ã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®ä¾‹:

SELECT
 u.user_id,
 u.user_name,
 MIN(o.order_date) AS first_purchase_date,
 COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders
FROM {{ ref('stg_ecommerce__users') }} AS u
LEFT JOIN {{ ref('stg_ecommerce__orders') }} AS o
 ON u.user_id = o.user_id
GROUP BY 1, 2
